member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect
member.summary: Converts an image from premultiplied to unpremultiplied alpha format.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Unpremultiply effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UnPremultiplyEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the UnPremultiplyEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for UnPremultiply effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1UnPremultiply GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Inputs
member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0) with the specified transform transform on the specified drawing session.
